articles.description: AMAZON has quietly rolled out a new update to its Alexa voice assistant designed to make lockdown a little more exciting.
articles.content: Amazon wants to improve your next post-work pint with the help of chatty AI assistant Alexa. With nine days until pubs, restaurants and hotels are allowed to reopen their doors to customers, Amazon w… [+2350 chars]
